ch.idsia.agents.controllers.kbarrett
Class LevelSceneInvestigator

java.lang.Object
  ch.idsia.agents.controllers.kbarrett.LevelSceneInvestigator

public class LevelSceneInvestigator
extends java.lang.Object

This class is responsible for seeing what is in the vicinity of Mario.

Author:
Kim Barrett

Method Detail

updateMapFromLevelScene

public void updateMapFromLevelScene(byte[][] levelScene)
Used for updating the map from a newly acquired levelScene.

Parameters:
levelScene - a 2D array representing the current environment of Mario encoded as integers.

setMarioScreenPos

public void setMarioScreenPos(float[] marioScreenPos)
Used for updating Mario's screen position. Note: will only update the stored position if it has varied by more than SQUARESIZE. This method also updates marioMapLoc, if Mario has moved into the space represented by a different position in map.

Parameters:
marioScreenPos - a float array of size 2 containing Mario's actual position on the screen. Note: this is as an (x,y) coordinate.

setMarioLoc

public void setMarioLoc(int[] marioLoc,
                        Movement movement)
Used for updating marioLoc.

Parameters:
marioLoc - int array of size 2 representing the position of Mario in levelScene.

updateCoins

public void updateCoins(int coins)
Used for updating the number of coins Mario has collected.

Parameters:
coins - the total number of coins Mario has collected so far.
See Also:
numberOfCollectedCoins

giveMapSize

public void giveMapSize(int width,
                        int height)
If no map has previously been created, creates a map of the given size.

Parameters:
width - of the map
height - of the map

isEnemy

public boolean isEnemy()

getNextLocation

public int[] getNextLocation(boolean isFacingRight,
                             boolean isJumping)
Used to make a decision based on the environment about which location Mario needs to move to.

Parameters:
isFacingRight - indicating whether Mario is facing right or not.
Returns:
byte array of size 2 denoting the location that has been decided to move towards. Returns null if no location has been chosen.
